**Government Tender Announcement: Construction Management Services**
=============================================================

### Reference and Solicitation Information

* Reference Number: WS3983309080-Doc4023733857
* Solicitation Number: WS3983309080
* Notice Date: June 19, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: July 18, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EDT

### Project Overview

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites proposals for Construction Management Services to convert the heating and cooling system at the Supreme Court of Canada Building, located in Ottawa, Ontario.

This project is part of the Energy Services Acquisition Program (ESAP), a larger initiative aimed at modernizing the systems that heat and cool over 80 federal and non-federal buildings in the National Capital Area.

### Key Requirements

* Provide Construction Management Services for the conversion of the heating and cooling system at the Supreme Court of Canada Building
* Meet the requirements of the User Building Conversion Plan (UBCP)
* Ensure compliance with the Energy Services Acquisition Program (ESAP) guidelines

### Proposal Submission Requirements

* Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and their proposal by July 18, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EDT
* Bids received after this deadline will be declared non-responsive

### Contact Information

* Michael McShane, (he-him), can be contacted via [michael.mcshane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:michael.mcshane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) for any questions or concerns regarding this project.

### Notice URL

* [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16626627](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16626627)

### Other Information

* Contracting entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Region of delivery: National Capital Region
* Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Solicitation method: Competitive, open bidding
* Evaluation criteria: Highest combined rating of technical merit and price.  \\  \\  \\  \\  \\  \\  \\  \\  \\
